mission.sub1: To be by your side in the real estate world to make the big "changes" in your life happy!
mission.title: Mission

profile.description: I'm a trained marketer and value creator by passion. I worked for years with brands and products, in order to better serve the Client and offer him not only what he needed, but also what best met his aspirations. I have focused on people and realising their full potential, I am a Master in Neuro Linguistic Programming and I believe in empowering people to achieve their goals and realise their life purpose. I dedicated myself to the real estate sector with a focus on the discovery of the unique asset: the house, the client, the transaction, the service. At KW I found the right structure to develop the Sofia Galvão Group's real estate brand with rigour, professionalism and trust. I have the market 'know how' and I provide my Clients the best deals, the ones that make them the happiest!

vision.sub1: To be the preferred team for clients who want to buy or sell property in the Lisbon and Porto areas, thanks to our professionalism, our capacity to generate good business and the values we profess on a daily basis.
vision.title: Vision

who.sub1: A dedicated and demanding team that, motivated by the best customer service, grows and goes further every day.
who.sub2: Focused on the professionalisation of the sector, we provide real estate consultancy with credibility, excellence and relevance.
who.title: Who are we?

passwords.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive a password recovery link at your email address in a few minutes.

registrations.destroyed: Bye! Your account has been successfully cancelled. We hope to see you again soon.

registrations.updated_but_not_signed_in: Your account has been updated successfully, but since your password was changed, you need to sign in again.

unlocks.unlocked: Your account has been unlocked successfully. Please sign in to continue.

invest.description: Possibility of making the payment according to the evolution phases of the work and construction.
invest.title: Phased investment

own.description: When you buy a house on the planning stage you have the guarantee that the property will be move-in ready and you have the certainty that you will be the first owner.
own.title: You will be the first owner of your new home

perspective.description: When you buy a plan, the investment you make is generally lower than if it were already a finished house. This means that your house, once ready, is a boost to your investment.
perspective.title: Prospects of better return on investment

warranty.description: A new property has a construction guarantee, as well as the certainty that there will be no need for improvements in the coming years.
warranty.title: Construction Guarantee

yours.description: The purchase in plan gives the future owner the possibility of making changes in terms of materials and sometimes in the configuration, so that your future home meets your needs and tastes.
yours.title: Property to your measure

errors.unavailable_session:
Session %{id} is no longer available in memory.

If you happen to run on a multi-process server (like Unicorn or Puma) the process
this request hit doesn't store %{id} in memory. Consider turning the number of
processes/workers to one (1) or using a different server in development.

newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay up to date with the most recent news, opportunities and tips on the market.
newsletter.terms: By contacting us you're allowing Sofia Galvão Group to store your data to later inform you about business opportunities, as stated in the Privacy Policy.
newsletter.title: Get the latest Market news

house_360.sub1: The special 360 service provides you with tailor-made solutions for each of your needs in the real estate universe.
house_360.sub2: With the quality guarantee of the partnerships we establish, we recommend companies that are a reference in their areas and "Together We make Happy Homes!"

beliefs.local: We believe that property brokerage is a local business driven by property consultants.
beliefs.partners: We believe that our real estate consultants should be treated as business partners.
beliefs.people: We believe that being in business with the right people makes a difference.
beliefs.profit: We believe that making a profit is paramount.
beliefs.reputation: We believe that no transaction can jeopardise our reputation.
beliefs.title: Beliefs

first_paragraph.bottom: KW has a total of 19 representations and more than 1.300 consultants and associates in Portugal.
first_paragraph.middle: Today, around the world more than 165,000 consultants and more than 1,000 Market Centers are KW affiliates.
first_paragraph.top: KW operates on the principle that if you focus all your resources on building your consultants' businesses, they will, in return, help build a company that exceeds all expectations. With this philosophy in practice, we are transforming the real estate landscape.

kw.more: Find out more about KW Portugal

perspectives.agent: Keller Williams thinks like a success agent, acts like a consultant/trainer providing models/systems, technology, products and services that enhance productivity and profitability.
perspectives.brand: We support the agent to develop their brand and not the opposite.
perspectives.consulting: We are a company built by Consultants, for Consultants.
perspectives.growth: We believe that we will grow as a company the more we are able to promote the growth of the people who work with us.
perspectives.learn: At Keller Williams we believe in learning for results and not in learning for learning's sake.
perspectives.people: What will make Keller Williams better in the long run is the way people think.
perspectives.tech: We are a Technology-driven Consulting and Training company dedicated to the real estate brokerage business.
perspectives.title: Perspectives

kw.subheader: A company made up of consultants for consultants!

sell.exclusive: We work on your home with exclusivity, dedication and provide close monitoring throughout the entire process.

list.agencies: Sharing the sale with all agencies in the market.
list.kw: Exclusive access to the entire KW PT network.
list.market: Market Research - preparation of comparative market analysis and characterisation reports of the area under consideration.
list.portal: Disclosure in the most relevant national and international real estate portals.
list.warranty: Ensuring implementation of industry regulated processes and procedures.

paragraph.bottom: Our aim is to find the best Client in the shortest amount of time and for that we offer:
paragraph.middle: We offer a consulting service that works in a unique way and is tailored to what you want - focusing on the strategy of promotion, dissemination and our best negotiation.
paragraph.top: We guarantee the best deal for your home.

sell.subheader: Find out how much your home is worth.

house_lens.description:
Buying or selling a house is most often about investing a large part, if not all, of your individual or family assets. This investment requires a careful and thoughtful analysis and safe options that will give you the confidence of an investment with return.

In every deal we carry out we look at you, our Client, also from an investor's perspective and we ensure that the profitability of the sale or purchase is part of the transaction's success criteria.
house_lens.title: Property investment

house_trees.description:
With access to exclusive platforms and tools for professionals we ensure the necessary market knowledge to identify your best options and pursue the best solutions.

We offer you an informed, personalised service, based on an experienced and competitive negotiation.
house_trees.title: Real Estate Management and Consultancy

text.bottom:
Get to know some of them.
If you want to know more please
text.top: As professionals in the real estate market, all the services related to real estate mediation and consultancy are within the scope of our activity for your benefit.
